glossentry.glossdef: A piece of a message transmitted over a packet-switching network. One of the key features of a packet is that it contains the destination address in addition to the data.
Policy Counter identifier identifies the policy counter of the subscriber that is stored in the OCS.

Policy and Charging Control is a component of LTE network that enhances the capabilities from earlier 3GPP releases to deliver dynamic control of policy and charging on a per subscriber and per IP flow basis.
Policy Charging Enforcement Function is a functional element that comprises of policy enforcement and flow based charging functions.

The policy control function (PCF) is a function in the core network used to control the usage of packet-switched services, that is to ensure that the user does not use more bandwidth than allowed or that the user only is accessing ‘approved’ services or web sites.
The Policy and Charging Rules Function software node deglosstermines the policy rules in a multimedia network.
Packet Data Protocol is a packet transfer protocol that is used in wireless network.
A Protocol Data Unit comprises of data and control information which is passed between layers in a protocol stack.
Packet Data Gateway is the interface between LTE network and various other packet data network.

Public Land Mobile Network is a regulatory glossterm in telecommunications which is a network that is established and operated by an administrating organization or by a Recognized Operating Agency (ROA) for providing land mobile telecommunications services to the public.

A Pod is the basic execution unit of a Kubernetes application, the smallest and simplest unit in the Kubernetes object model that is created and deployed. A Pod encapsulates an application’s container, storage resources, a unique network IP, and options that govern how the container should run. In NCC CNF, each pod includes a single container, and Docker is the container runtime used.
Postpaid accounts is an account which does not require a credit balance.
In a policy based network, policy is defined as a set of guidelines that define the logic of security environment and resource allocation in a network.
Policy Counter Status Report is used by the OCS to know the status of various policy counters.
Post billing cycle value is the actual value of the bucket and counter after the reset or renewal of a subscription.
Previous billing cycle value is the value of the bucket and counters before the reset or renewal time.
Prepaid account is an account that requires certain amount of credit value loaded in the card, in advance.
Prometheus is an open source monitoring system that stores its data in a time series database which manages metrics and associated alerts.
A set of rules for interaction between two or more entities or Network Elements (NEs).
Pre-Paid Card has credit value loaded in the card in advance.
